resources.string:
1. Click the "Send Parcel" option from homepage.

2. Fill up the following form of the page

3. Click the "Send Pickup Request" option to confirm the request.

The standard shipping charge in Dhaka is 80tk and outside the city is 150tk. The shipping charge up to 5kg will cost extra but after 5kg, per kg cost 8tk for standard and 15tk for express respectively
Does it cost anything to use Flash Express app?
No, you can download and use the app for free
Can I avail the service without internet?
Yes, you can place parcel shipping request by calling us at out 09610056879.
Do you have any Emergency/ Helpline contact number?
The Helpline and contact numbers are in our Contact Us Page. You may even reach us via email.
